TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AxisEnabled extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the state of an axis.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisEnabled> enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A> property to enable or disable an axis.
If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A> property is set to Auto, an axis may or may not be displayed, depending on whether it is being used to plot a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>. The axes that are used to plot data for a series are determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XAxisType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YAxisType%2A> property settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisEnabled Auto = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The axis is only enabled if it used to plot a .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisEnabled False = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisEnabled True = int32(1)
